#Page1Line1-0#  Once upon a time Jackal was
#Page1Line1-1#  walking around the bush.|
#Page1Line1-1#  He was very hungry.
#Page1Time1#		5.5

#Page1Line2-0#  He saw crow flying above the trees.|
#Page1Line2-1#  Crow had a huge piece of cheese in his mouth.
#Page1Time2#		6.3


##Page 2
#Page2Line1-0#  "Hmmm...that cheese looks delicious!| I must 
#Page2Line1-1#  find a way to get it."| thought the jackal.
#Page2Time1#		6.7

#Page2Line2-0#  "Oh,| I have a plan!"| said Jackal to 
#Page2Line2-1#  himself while wiping his mouth quickly.
#Page2Time2#		4.8

#Page2Line3#  	He did not want Crow to notice that he was hungry.
#Page2Time3#		3.1


##Page 3
#Page3Line1-0#  Crow had been flying the whole morning.|
#Page3Line1-1#  He was tired.
#Page3Time1#		4.0

#Page3Line2#  	He decided to sit on a branch of a tree.
#Page3Time2#		2.6

#Page3Line3-0#  The jackal sat down under the
#Page3Line3-1#  tree where Crow was sitting.
#Page3Time3#		2.9


##Page 4
#Page4Line1-0#  Jackal called with a huge smile,|
#Page4Line1-1#  "Hello Crow!| You're looking very good today."
#Page4Time1#		5.6

#Page4Line2-0#  "Your feathers look glossy and healthy."|
#Page4Line2-1#  "You must be taking very good care of yourself."
#Page4Time2#		5.1


##Page 5
#Page5Line1#  	Crow was very flattered to hear this. 
#Page5Time1#		2.1
#Page5Line2-0#  Crow always thought that he was the strongest

#Page5Time2#		6.3


##Page 6
#Page6Line1-0#  "I hear you also have the most beautiful
#Page6Line1-1#  singing voice of all the other birds."

#Page6Time2#		2.5


##Page 7
#Page7Line1-0#  Crow was so flattered that he stretched his
#Page7Line1-1#  wings and prepared to sing for the jackal.
#Page7Time1#		5.5
#Page7Line2-0#  He pushed his chest out and
#Page7Line2-1#  let out a loud high pitched sound.
#Page7Time2#		3.6
